channel.title: [PI]Disconnects If You Go Up/Down A Floor?[PI]
channel.description:
[u]Note: I do not know if this was a server-sided or client-sided problem. Sorry if this is the wrong section.[/u]
On my PI base, if you go up or down a floor (Example: Slayer Tower. If you click on stairs.) the client is nulled and you have to close it and open a new one. I cannot understand why this is happening. Can anybody help me? :(
I rep++! :D
